## Government Tender Announcement
### W0107-230002 - Retender for Qualification and Calibration of CMED and Det. Trenton Equipment RFP

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3976195208-Doc4042511566
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-22T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-07
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2028-04-30

#### Tender Description
Canada is seeking to invite offers from suppliers to provide qualification and calibration services for refrigerators and freezers used to store pharmaceuticals at the Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) and Det. Trenton.

#### Tender Requirements

* The tender is to be submitted through Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys websites.
* The tender closing deadline has been amended to 14:00 EDT on 2023-06-22.
* All required supporting documentation and the bid submission must be submitted by the revised closing time.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

#### Tender Category and Trade Agreements
This tender falls under the Service Category (SRV) and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.

#### End User Entities and Contracting Entity
The successful bidder will provide services to the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED).

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Darlene Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16502755?extsite=MTY1MDI3NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
